name: review-ai-reply-functions
description: Firebase Cloud Functions for automated AI review workflow

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf src/shared && mkdir -p src/shared && cp -r ../lib/ai ../types src/shared/ && ([ -f src/shared/ai/prompts/builder.ts ] && sed -i.bak 's|@/types/database|../../types/database|g' src/shared/ai/prompts/builder.ts && rm -f src/shared/ai/prompts/builder.ts.bak || true) && ([ -f src/shared/types/database.ts ] && sed -i.bak 's|@/lib/ai/prompts/template|../ai/prompts/template|g' src/shared/types/database.ts && rm -f src/shared/types/database.ts.bak || true)
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
